description: My honours project was to create a suite of accessible mobile games for the visually impaired. I achieved this by utilising a screen reader and simple screen gestures. The suite of mobile games included Snakes and Ladders, Battleships, Cluedo, Mastermind and a Tamagotchi. These mobile games were built for Android smart phones using the Flutter framework and Dart programming language.
subDescriptions: Advanced Algorithms | Software Construction | Software Verification and Analysis | Computer Vision | Computing and Society | Princicples of Data Science.
